DOC.brief_summary: In study , patient divide 3 group 35 case include : 1.oxygen 2.enalapril 3.control . In begin study , best correct visual acuity ( BCVA ) , uncorrected visual acuity ( UCVA ) , optical coherence tomography ( OCT ) measure . Patients oxygen group give oxygen 10 lit/min 1 hour twice day first month , day second month every day third month . In enalapril group , patient give enalapril 5 mg every night placebo give patient third group . At end first month patient ' vision check end third month first physical examination perform . In first group , arterial blood gas ( ABG ) take oxygen therapy well .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Effects Oxygen Therapy Enalapril Diabetic Macular Ischemia
DOC.criteria: Patients diagnose diabetic macular ischemia HTN > 1140/90 HTN control ACE inhibitor FBS > 200 Severe anemia , COPD , cataract , HRPDR diffuse macular edema
